quote: I love when I find it's not to buy this. It saves us all time.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the notion that agents should always push for a sale.
suggested_hook: Why telling your clients not to buy could be your secret weapon.

quote: If you buy something that's good value, the check's all the boxes, and you don't put yourself in a position to have to sell, you're not going to lose money.
why_clipworthy: Provides a clear strategy for advising clients on property investment.
suggested_hook: The key to ensuring your real estate investment always pays off.
